    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eln:demoportal</catalog>
            <entry>1822</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="no">Hammer</string>
            <string language="en">Hammer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hammer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Marteau</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Martelo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Martello</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σφυρί</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Martillo</string>
          </title>
          <language>no</language>
          <description>
            <string language="no">Hvilke krefter virker når du skal trekke ut en spiker med en hammer? Lær å beregne kraften som trengs</string>
            <string language="en">Which forces are activated when you are pulling a nail with a hammer? Learn how to calculate the force needed.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">kraft</string>
            <string language="en">force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="no">beregn kraft</string>
            <string language="en">calculate the force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Welche Kräfte werden aktiviert, wenn Sie einen 
Nagel mit einem Hammer ziehen? Erlernen Sie, wie man die 
benötigte Kraft errechnet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quelles forces sont lancées quand vous tirez un 
ongle avec un marteau ? Apprenez comment calculer la force 
requise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que forças são ativadas quando você está 
puxando um prego com um martelo? Aprenda como calcular a força 
necessitada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quali forze sono attivate quando state tirando un 
chiodo con un martello? Impari come calcolare la forza stata 
necessaria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιες δυνάμεις ενεργοποιούνται όταν τραβάτε ένα 
καρφί με ένα σφυρί; Μάθετε πώς να υπολογίσει τη δύναμη 
που απαιτείται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Se activan qué fuerzas cuando usted está 
tirando de un clavo con un martillo? Aprenda cómo calcular la 
fuerza necesitada.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">errechnen Sie die Kraft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">calculez la force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">calcule a força</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">forza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">calcoli la forza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπολογίστε τη δύναμη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">fuerza</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">calcule la fuerza</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
